Hello! How can I assist you today?

Daytrading is a style of trading in financial markets wherein traders buy and sell securities within the same trading day. The goal is to profit from small price movements in highly liquid stocks or currencies. Day traders might make several trades in a single day but will close all their positions by the end of the trading day, hence the term "day" trading. They typically use leverage to capitalize on small price movements in highly liquid stocks or indexes.

learnedResponses.response:
Title: AI Learning and External Query Progress Dashboard

![Dashboard](https://www.exampleimagelink.com)

1. Learning Progress Graph
    - This graph will dynamically illustrate the AI's learning progress over time. The X-axis represents time, and the Y-axis represents the amount of information learned. A line will ascend continuously on the chart, reflecting the AI's continuous learning from both internal and external sources. 

2. Last Ten External AI Queries
    - This section will display a log of the last ten questions asked by our AI to external AIs. It will be updated in real time and will include the date and time of each inquiry.

Mockup Details:

Header: "AI Learning Progress & External Query Log"

1. Learning Graph Section:
    - "Learning Progress Over Time" - Label for graph
    - Time (X-axis)
    - Knowledge acquired (Y-axis)
    - "Date: mm/dd/yyyy || Knowledge count: ####" - Tooltip shown on hover over each data point in the graph

2. Recent Queries Section:
    - "Last Ten Queries Asked to External AIs" - Label for query log
    - "Query #1: [Question here] || Date & Time: mm/dd/yyyy, HH:MM:SS"
    - Rows for Queries #2-10

Footer: "AI Learning Progress Updated in Real Time"

Features:
- A hover tooltip feature over each data point on the graph, revealing specific details about knowledge data.
- Each logged query will be clickable, which will open a new page showing the full question and response details.
- The page will auto-update every few seconds to reflect real-time data accurately.

This structured page design ensures that users can quickly and conveniently assess the progress of the AI's learning, as well as track the AI’s communication with external sources for additional knowledge input.
